AvatarArchetype.Description: The dependable class representative and kendo club captain. Their affinity manifests as a samurai guardian spirit, channeling unwavering determination and protective instincts.
The rebellious student with a heart of gold hidden beneath a tough exterior. Their affinity takes the form of an oni, raw emotion given devastating physical form.
The mysterious new student who arrived mid-semester. Nobody knows their past, and their affinity is a kitsune - cunning, quick, and full of secrets.
Always observing from the sidelines, camera in hand. Their keen perception awakened a tengu affinity, granting supernatural awareness and precision strikes from afar.
Top of the class with perfect grades, but socially awkward. Their brilliant mind manifests a affinity of pure elemental force - an onmyoji spirit wielding the classical elements.
President of the occult research club, always talking about spirits and curses. Turns out they were right all along. Their affinity is an ancient yokai sage of forbidden knowledge.
A part-time miko at a local shrine, drawn to Ise by fate. Their deep spiritual connection awakens a divine affinity - a manifestation of Amaterasu's blessing.
Dreams of becoming a famous idol while balancing school. Their charisma and voice manifest a celestial affinity that inspires allies and charms enemies with supernatural melodies.
Child of a kannushi priest, raised among rituals and traditions. They can forge contracts with shikigami spirits, commanding multiple affinity-like entities in battle.
